en.title: AI Conversation
en.prompt: In the following scenario, someone said something to me. Please help me analyze what the other person might want to express and provide a suitable response. Scenario: [Describe a specific situation]. The speaker says: [Specific words]. What could be the other person's intention? How should I respond?
en.remark: 空気を読む read the air. For some incomprehensible conversations, provide the context of the conversation for AI to interpret and formulate an appropriate response.

metaDescription: Confused by a conversation? This prompt helps you "read the air" by having the AI analyze what someone said, guess their intention, and suggest how you should respond.
